code: import React from'react';import s from'./Dialogs.module.css';import DialogsItem from'./DialogsItem/DialogsItem';import DialogsMessage from'./DialogMessage/DialogsMessage';import{addMessageCreate,updateMessageCreate}from'../../Redux/dialogsReducer';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Dialogs=function Dialogs(props){var dialogsItems=props.dialogsData.dialogsData.map(function(d){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DialogsItem,{name:d.name,id:d.id});});var messageItems=props.dialogsData.messageData.map(function(m){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DialogsMessage,{message:m.message});});var newMessageEl=/*#__PURE__*/React.createRef();var addMessage=function addMessage(){props.dispatch(addMessageCreate());};var onCheckUpdate=function onCheckUpdate(){var text=newMessageEl.current.value;props.dispatch(updateMessageCreate(text));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:s.dialogs,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:s.dialogsItems,children:dialogsItems}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:s.messages,children:[messageItems,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{onChange:onCheckUpdate,ref:newMessageEl,value:props.dialogsData.updateMessage})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addMessage,children:"New message"})})]})]});};export default Dialogs;
